article.title: L-3 Wins Nearly $538 Million Airborne Sensors Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications Integrated Systems Platform Integration Division, Waco, Texas, is being awarded nearly $538 million for the Airborne Sensors Program. Under this contract, L-3 Communications will provide mission support and operations and sustainment for the High Altitude Observatory I, II and III and the Wide-body Airborne Sensor Platform.Â The Missile Defense Agency, Huntsville, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
